csv.description: XBRL facts as CSV files in a zip report package.

searchByNameOrNumber: Search by Company Name or Number
searchPlaceholder: Company Name, CRN (Company Registration Number), or LEI (Legal Entity Identifier)
whatXbrlDetails:
In the UK, iXBRL is used to tag accounts and other business information in annual reports and submit them as inline XBRL (iXBRL) reports to the UK Business Register: Companies House; Securities Regulator: Financial Conduct Authority; Tax Authority: HM Revenue & Customs, Charities Regulator: Charity Commission for England and Wales.

The UK iXBRL Viewer, funded by the UK's Regulators' Pioneer Fund (Department for Science, Innovation and Technology), allows users to access machine-readable structured data (XBRL facts) from tagged iXBRL reports available in the Companies House Registry and the National Storage Mechanism. For more information on the UK iXBRL Viewer, please see the
whatXbrlSummary: iXBRL is an extension of XBRL (eXtensible Business Reporting Language), the international standard for sharing business information electronically.
